tagline: Specific, honest recommendations for dining and experiences — not just 'try this place' but 'order this dish'
pros: Specific order-level recommendations, not just restaurant names
Calibrates to budget, dietary needs, and adventurousness
Honest about hype — distinguishes genuine quality from trends
Cultural context enriches the dining experience
cons: Recommends only — doesn't handle reservations or booking
Regional knowledge varies — needs location context
Opinionated — may not match everyone's taste exactly

model_recommendations.notes: Template-following, scheduling, tracking, simple Q&A. Lightweight models save cost without sacrificing quality for these structured tasks.
